name: Abandoned Warehouse
description: A cold, empty warehouse where the desperate find shelter from the elements.
initialState: Broken crates and old tarps provide makeshift bedding. Wind whistles through gaps in the walls.

name: Lower Ward Square
description: A small square where the poor gather to share news and seek opportunities.
initialState: Worn cobblestones and a broken fountain. Desperate souls linger in doorways.

name: Martha's Wharf
description: A working wharf where dock workers load and unload river barges for daily wages.
initialState: Stacks of crates and barrels. The smell of tar and river water fills the air.

name: Private Room
description: A discreet meeting room in the Merchant's Rest, reserved for confidential business.
initialState: Well-appointed room with comfortable chairs and thick curtains for privacy.

name: Fishmonger's Stall
description: Frans' fish stall, where fresh catches are sold and dock gossip is traded freely.
initialState: Fish laid out on ice, scales glittering in the light. The sharp smell of brine fills the air.

name: Guild Offices
description: The working offices of the Merchant Guild, where trade agreements are negotiated and licenses issued.
initialState: Clerks move between desks piled with ledgers. The smell of ink and wax seals fills the air.

name: Guild Registry
description: The official registry where merchant endorsements are recorded and seals are granted.
initialState: A grand desk with the guild's seal prominently displayed. Certificates line the walls.

name: Dispatch Office
description: The busy heart of the Courier's Guild, where messengers receive assignments and report deliveries.
initialState: A large board displays routes and schedules. Messengers come and go constantly.

name: Seal Registry
description: Where courier endorsements are validated and messenger seals are issued.
initialState: Official stamps and seal molds arranged precisely. A registry book lies open.

name: Reading Hall
description: A vast hall filled with books and scrolls, where scholars pursue their research.
initialState: Tall shelves reach toward vaulted ceilings. The only sounds are turning pages and scratching quills.

name: Certification Chamber
description: Where scholarly achievements are recognized and academic seals are granted.
initialState: An ornate chamber with portraits of distinguished scholars. A ceremonial desk holds the guild seal.
